job.title: Software Engineer - Java and Angular Application Developer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrWealth and Investment Management Technology is seeking a Software EngineerApplications Developer with strong background in Java and Angular development This position will be part of a Java development team building and supporting enterprise applications In this role you will design develop and support Java applications for the Wealth and Trust businesses The ideal candidate will have good communication skills possess good problem solving skills and work well in a teambrbrstronguKey Responsibilities Includebrustrongul liDesign develop and maintain enterprise class mission critical web applications for Wealth amp Trust business domainsli liContribute in all aspects of application development life cycle analysis design develop test deploy supportli liWriting high quality amp high performance code with high level of test coverage li liAdhering to Software Development Lifecycle policies procedures and standardsli liEnsuring applications adhere to all Wells Fargo policies vulnerability management and technology updatesli liImproving processes and automating to make them simpler faster and more secureli liAct as senior developer supporting other developers and provide technical direction to less experienced staffli liInteract with business teams to review analyze design and implement solutions that meet the business needli liEnsure documentation on architecture processes and systems changes are up to dateli liCollaborate with other teams amp team members to design implement and maintain software solutionsli liBe part of highperforming agile team with ability to flex according to project needsli liContinuously learn to improve skills and staying current on technology trendsbrbrliulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years of software engineering experiencelili5 years of Java experiencelili1 year of experience developing with Angular 7 and above applicationlili3 years of experience with databases such as Oracle DB2 SQL server or Teradatalili2 years of experience with Spring Spring Batch and Spring Bootlili2 years of experience with one or a combination of the following RESTful JSON or XML webbased serviceslili1 year of Agile experiencebrbrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliA BSBA degree or higher in science or technologyliliKnowledge and understanding of cloud computinglili1 year of Pivotal Cloud Foundry PCF experienceliliMessaging Queue MQ experienceliliKnowledge and understanding of Selenium software testing frameworkliliKnowledge and understanding of application testing methodologies tools and executionliliKnowledge of widely successful Agile techniques User Stories ATDD TDD Continuous Integration Continuous Testing Pairing Automated Testing Agile GamesliliBrokerage or wealth management experiencebrbrliulstrongJob ExpectationsbrstrongulliAbility to work additional hours as neededliliAbility to work on call as assignedliliFlexibility to work in a 247 environment including weekends and holidaysbrbrliulstrongDisclaimerbrstrongulAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActbrbrRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service
